response.original_title: Two Paths: The Psychology of a Freelancer vs a Full-Time Employee
response.overview: What do I do next? Do I go Freelance? Or Do I look for a full-time job? These are the questions most students in the creative field constantly ask themselves, especially when graduation is around the corner. Here we delve deep into the psychology of a freelancer and full-time employee, to better understand what is the optimal mindset to have in order to succeed in this competitive field.
response.title: Two Paths: The Psychology of a Freelancer vs a Full-Time Employee
